description:
Hoping to understand their classmate Komi more so they can be friends with her, Nakanaka and Yamai decide to talk to Tadano.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just a Thought. / It`s Just a Fantasy, Part 2. / It`s Just an Invitation to Lunch. / It`s Just Roasted Sweet Potatoes.
Kimochi Desu. / Mousou Desu. 2 / Ohiru no Osasoi Desu. / Ishiyakiimo Desu.
気持ちです. / 妄想です. 2 / お昼のお誘いです. / 石焼き芋です.
